name: Pumpkin Rolls
steps: Mix flour, sugar, salt, ginger, cinnamon
Place in greased bowl, cover, rise until doubled (~60 minutes)

name: Pizza Dough
notes:
- Can be made 3 days ahead
- Let balls rest 2-3 hours before use

name: Focaccia
ingredients: 2 tbsp fresh rosemary leaves, rough chop
steps: Pour half oil into cast iron skillet, place ball, push down
Spread out to sides, pop air bubbles, lift to release air
Sprinkle rosemary, rest of oil, sea salt
notes:
4g of yeast is ~1 tsp.

If crust isn't crisp enough, can heat on stove-top over medium heat

name: Quiche
steps: whisk 1 egg in with the flour
reduce heat, bake @325 for 30-40 minutes; until center is firm
notes: Can add toppings between crust and mixture: spinach, zucchini, etc.

name: Peanut Butter Dirt Cake
steps: Whip 1/2 cup whipping cream with liquid sweetener until it holds stiff peaks

In another bowl, beat cream cheese with 1/2 cup powdered sweetener until
  smooth
Beat in peanut butter and 1/4 cup whipping cream
Spread over crust, place in fridge
Over medium heat combine milk, 1 cup whipping cream, 1/2 cup sweetener, simmer

In a bowl, whisk egg yolks, add ~1/2 cup hot cream mixture to temper, whisk
  eggs back into saucepan
Reduce heat, whisk xanthan gum, cocoa powder, thicken 3-4 minutes
Remove from heat, stir in chocolate, butter, vanilla until smooth
Cool ~15 minutes, spread on peanut butter layer
notes: Corn starch can be substituted for xanthan gum.

name: Brookies
steps: Melt 1/2 cup butter, add 1 cup white sugar until smooth, cool 5 minutes
Add 2 eggs, 2 tsp vanilla until smooth
Mix cocoa powder, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 3/4 cup flour
Add #3 to #2 until smooth; add 1/2 cup chocolate chips; set aside

Melt 12 tbsp butter, add brown sugar, 1/4 white sugar until smooth; cool 5
  minutes
Add 2 eggs, 2 tsp vanilla until smooth
Mix 2 cup flour, 1 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp salt
Add #7 to #6 until smoother; ;add 1/2 cup chocolate chips
Add alternating rows of #4 and #8 to baking pan

name: Candied Ginger
steps: Peel ginger, cut into thin slices
Add to pot; cover with water; boil for 10 minutes
Weigh ginger; add equal amount sugar
Add ginger, sugar, liquid to pot over medium

name: Baked Apples
steps: Add mixture to each apple; top with butter
Add apples, 3/4 cup boiling water to baking dish
notes: Recommended apples Rome Beauty, Golden Delicious, Jonagold

name: Cheesy chicken broccoli and rice
steps: Cook for 10 minutes on high pressure

name: Instant Pot Butter Chicken
steps: set to manual, low pressure, 5 minutes

name: Thai Coconut Curry Chicken
steps: Add potatoes, lime leaves, cumin seeds

name: Cast Iron Pizza
steps: Heat dough in skillet with oil over medium heat until starting to brown
notes: - Oven should be as hot as possible

name: Savory Stir Fry
notes: Mostly a place-holder for meal planning.

name: Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cup veggies (broccoli, carrots, brussel sprouts, cauliflower, green beans)

name: Soup
notes: This is just a placeholder for meal planning. I don't use a recipe for soups.

name: Baked Teriyaki Chicken
steps: Simmer sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, ginger, pepper
Combine corn starch, water; add to sauce
Place chicken thighs in baking dish
Spread sauce every 10 minutes, flip after 30 minutes

name: Orange Chicken
steps:
In saucepan add 1 1/2 cups water, orange juice, lemon juice, rice vinegar, soy
  sauce, orange zest, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, onion, red pepper flakes
Bring to boil, let cool 15 minutes
Place chicken pieces into plastic bag, add 1 cup sauce, marinate 2 hours
In another bag mix flour, salt, pepper; add chicken; shake to coat
Saute chicken in generous amount of oil
Drain on paper towel lined plate
Mix 3 tbsp cornstarch, 2 tbsp water; add to sauce
Add mixture, sauce to wok; boil; add chicken; simmer 5 minutes

name: Chinese Chicken Wings
steps:
Mix tamari, vinegar, sriracha,  five-spice, brown sugar, garlic, sesame oil,
  whites of scallions; set aside 2 tbsp
Add sauce, chicken to plastic bag; marinate over night
Add water, chicken to instant pot; chicken shouldn't touch water or be stacked
Add chicken to making sheet; brush with 2 tbsp sauce
Garnish sesame seeds, rest of scallions
notes: Can substitute soy sauce for tamari

name: Split Pea Soup
steps: add garlic, salt, pepper, saute 1 minute more
add split peas, ham bone, stock, water, bay leaf, thyme
notes:
Can blend soup near end.

Other recipes call for seasoning with just marjoram or the following:
- 3 cloves garlic
- 4 allspice berries
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 tsp fresh thyme
- 8 sprigs fresh parsley

name: Glogg
steps: Mix port, bourbon, rum; bring to just under simmer

Place cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, orange peel, raisins, almonds to cheese
  cloth
Bring to just under boil, light with match
Let burn for 1 minute, summon dark god
Cover pot to extinguish, let cool to room temperature, about 1 hour
Remove spices, return drink to bottles

name: Sushi Rice
steps: Cook rice; let cool to handle
Simmer vinegar, oil, sugar, salt until dissolved

name: Chicken Stock
ingredients: 1 set leftover chicken bones, skin, etc
steps: cover chicken with water, bring to a boil
add everything to pot, simmer at least 4 hours
notes:
If freezing, boil down for an hour to concentrate stock.

Some recipes add apple cider vinegar

name: Sauerkraut
steps:
Add to fermentation jar, ensure cabbage is fully submerged in brine (add 2%
  salt brine if needed)

Inside jar: cover top of cabbage with plastic wrap (or reserved cabbage
  leaves) and weight down to ensure cabbage is fully submerged
Leave in cool, dark place at room temperature @65-70 for 3-6 weeks
When fermented transfer to fridge for up to 6 months.
notes:
- Salt ratio is 2%
- Caraway seeds gives a more German style; juniper seeds more Alsatian style
- See Brother's Green [[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iiNl0Jv6xTw][video]].

name: Pizza Sauce
ingredients: spices (salt, pepper, basil, oregano, bay leaf, fennel seeds)
steps: saute onion, celery, garlic until translucent

name: Holiday Squash
steps: Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, allspice, salt, butter; mix until crumbly
Place third of slices on baking sheet; layer with 3/4 cup mixture
Layer rest of squash; adding rest of mixture

Cover with foil; bake @350 for 1 hour; remove foil; bake another 10 minutes or
  until squash is done
